title: The Trouble with Wedding Dates
description: MacKenzie's mom is hounding her to find a date for her sister's wedding but finding a suitable date is easier said than done when you have more curves than the average woman. As if that's not enough stress for one person to handle, throw in an unexpected visit from her best friend, Grant MacDaniels, at 2 AM that results in unexpected consequences. What's a girl to do when she's keeping secrets from everyone around her?
author: Liza Kline
